agenda.description: ** REVISION ** SENATE NOTICE OF PUBLIC HEARING COMMITTEE: Nominations TIME & DATE: 11:00 AM or upon adjournment Thursday, April 4, 2019 PLACE: E1.036 (Finance Room) CHAIR: Senator Dawn Buckingham 24 Hour Posting Rule Suspended __________________________________________________________________________________ To consider the following: Discussion and Action on Pending Business from the Thursday, March 28, 2019, meeting. NOTE NEW ROOM LOCATION The following nominees will not appear: Gulf Coast Authority Board of Directors Lamont Edward Meaux Appointed 11-12-18 for a Creighton Chambers County term to expire 08-31-20 Kevin Michael Scott Appointed 11-12-18 for a Taylor Galveston County term to expire 08-31-20 Manufactured Housing Board Sylvia Letitia Acuff- Appointed 03-13-19 for a Nelson Guzman term to expire 01-31-25 Denton County Ronald Maxie Richards Appointed 12-20-18 for a Taylor Galveston County term to expire 01-31-23 Keith C. Thompson Appointed 12-20-18 for a Perry Lubbock County term to expire 01-31-23 Texas Underground Facility Notification Corporation (One-Call Board) Joseph Wayne Costa Appointed 12-18-18 for a West Dallas County term to expire 08-31-20 William Ogden Geise Appointed 12-18-18 for a Watson Travis County term to expire 08-31-20 Marcela Navarrete Appointed 12-18-18 for a Rodríguez El Paso County term to expire 08-31-21 Christopher Scott Nowak Appointed 03-20-19 for a Bettencourt Harris County term to expire 08-31-20 Manish Seth Appointed 12-18-18 for a Huffman Fort Bend County term to expire 08-31-21 George Spencer Appointed 12-18-18 for a Buckingham Travis County term to expire 08-31-20 Lester Lee Stephens Appointed 12-18-18 for a Campbell Comal County term to expire 08-31-21 Richard David Tesson Appointed 03-20-19 for a Huffman Harris County term to expire 08-31-21 Real Estate Research Advisory Committee Troy C.
